details: In pustular diseases of skin and night-sweats. Also in gout and chronic rheumatism.

Head: Face puffy and pale
Pupils dilated
Supraorbital and temporal pain on right side, with lachrymation
Stomach: Feeling of pins and needles at pit of stomach, of EMPTINESS, must eat frequently
Pain in pit of stomach and region of navel

name: Taxus baccata
